thread.title: US stocks rise but biotech dents Nasdaq gain
thread.title_full: US stocks rise but biotech dents Nasdaq gain

title: US stocks rise but biotech dents Nasdaq gain
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 21, 2015, 21:23 BST - UK Markets closed US stocks rise but biotech dents Nasdaq gain AFP – 13 minutes ago View Photo 

The Dow and S&P 500 rallied Monday, recovering some of the prior session's losses, but gains were minimal on the tech-rich Nasdaq due to weakness among biotech shares. 
At the closing bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average stood at 16,511.99, up 127.41 points (0.78 percent). 
The broad-based S&P 500 rose 9.19 (0.47 percent) to 1,967.22, while the Nasdaq Composite Index edged up 1.73 (0.04 percent) to 4,828.95. 
Biotech shares fell sharply after Democratic presidential frontrunner Hillary Clinton pledged to take action against runaway price increases on specialty drugs. 
Shares of Biogen fell 5.6 percent, while Gilead Sciences lost 2.5 percent. 
Conventional pharma companies also dropped. The two weakest Dow stocks were Merck, down 2.2 percent, and Pfizer, down 1.3 percent). Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
